DOCNAME: CASE OF TOTH, MAGYAR AND TOTHNE v. HUNGARY
CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1 (length of proceedings);Remainder inadmissible;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants were born in DATE , DATE and DATE respectively , and live in the same household in GPE , GPE .

CARDINAL . On account of his modest means and the financial burden of his minor daughter ’s upbringing , on DATE the first applicant lodged a request for a special family allowance ( rendszeres nevelési segély ) with the Mayor of GPE . In DATE the request was refused ; the applicant filed an administrative appeal . On DATE ORG of GPE upheld the Mayor ’s decision .
CARDINAL . On DATE the first applicant brought an action before FAC for the judicial review of ORG decision . On DATE ORG dismissed his motions for bias against ORG and ORG .

CARDINAL . On DATE and DATE hearings were held . Following proceedings concerning the first applicant ’s renewed motions of bias , on DATE the case was transferred to ORG , because of a change in the law concerning ORG jurisdiction .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG dismissed the action . On CARDINAL DATE the first applicant challenged this decision before ORG . On DATE ORG invited him to complete his motion , which he did on DATE . On DATE it decided to deal with the motion in appellate , rather than review proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG quashed the decision of DATE and remitted the case .

CARDINAL . In the resumed proceedings , the judges of ORG declared themselves biased . On DATE ORG appointed GPE to hear the case . That court appointed a legal - aid lawyer for the first applicant on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Bács - Kiskun County Regional Court quashed ORG decision and remitted the case to the first administrative body . The respondent authority appealed .
CARDINAL . NORP On DATE ORG held a hearing but the parties did not appear . On DATE it upheld ORG decision .

CARDINAL . In the resumed administrative proceedings , on DATE the first applicant was granted the allowance sought . His quantitative appeal was dismissed by the second - instance administrative authority on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant sought judicial review . On DATE the ORG dismissed his action .

CARDINAL . In DATE and DATE the applicants , acting on behalf of their minor children , lodged several requests with the Mayor of GPE for another type of social benefit ( gyermekintézményi étkeztetési térítési díj támogatása ) . On DATE and DATE , respectively , their requests were refused . ORG of GPE dismissed their administrative appeals on DATE and DATE , respectively . The applicants sought judicial review before the JászNagykunSzolnok ORG .

CARDINAL . ORG dismissed their action on DATE , holding that the administrative authorities’ decisions had been in compliance with the local regulations . The latter excluded the disbursement of the allowance sought if the requesting individuals received other social benefits ( rendszeres gyermekvédelmi támogatás ) – which was the applicants’ case .
